verses.name: Jeremiah 10:1
verses.text: Hear ye the word which the Lord speaketh unto you, O house of Israel:

verses.name: Jeremiah 10:2
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, Learn not the way of the heathen, and be not dismayed at the signs of heaven; for the heathen are dismayed at them.

verses.name: Jeremiah 10:3
verses.text: For the customs of the people are vain: for one cutteth a tree out of the forest, the work of the hands of the workman, with the axe.

verses.name: Jeremiah 10:4
verses.text: They deck it with silver and with gold; they fasten it with nails and with hammers, that it move not.
